text_block_list.name: [Demon]
text_block_list.text: —— How many years… no, perhaps it was centuries ago. All things drift from me… but yes, I remember now.

text_block_list.name: [Demon]
text_block_list.text: On Hallowe'en, the village welcomes souls from beyond, extending a warm welcome to humans and demons alike.

text_block_list.name: [Demon]
text_block_list.text: But it's always the same. They gather to talk about the dead. It got tiresome, and I found myself wandering the village……

text_block_list.name: [Demon]
text_block_list.text: That mansion had long since fallen to ruin, devoid of human presence… yet a feast now laid prepared.

text_block_list.name: [Demon]
text_block_list.text: Someone… no, something is there. Something awaits the return of the deceased…

text_block_list.name: [Demon]
text_block_list.text: At first glance, it's unmistakably "not alive". Yet, it's also "not dead"…

text_block_list.name: [Mechanical Doll]
text_block_list.text: —— Uninvited guest, who might you be?

text_block_list.name: [Demon]
text_block_list.text: And "what" are you? State your name.

text_block_list.name: [Mechanical Doll]
text_block_list.text: I bear no name. I am a <Mechanical Doll>, as documented in my blueprint.

text_block_list.name: [Demon]
text_block_list.text: <Mechanical Doll>?

text_block_list.name: [Creator]
text_block_list.text: "A creation comprised of patched flesh and machinery, with oil flowing like blood through its veins. Astonishingly, it is able to understand and articulate speech."

text_block_list.name: [Creator]
text_block_list.text: "My magnum opus in this lifetime! And an enduring, historic sin… for I have given birth to an empty monster."

text_block_list.name: [Demon]
text_block_list.text: …… Ah, I understand now. Those who seek to play God can be found throughout every era.

text_block_list.name: [Mechanical Doll]
text_block_list.text: It appears you're a well-known demon. I believe your realm must house my creator.

text_block_list.name: [Mechanical Doll]
text_block_list.text: I have a request. Would you please bring my creator to me?

text_block_list.name: [Mechanical Doll]
text_block_list.text: For a 100 years, I have awaited my master's visit on this night. My creator, who passed away immediately after my birth.

text_block_list.name: [Mechanical Doll]
text_block_list.text: I simply wish to meet them. I desire to know…… the purpose of my existence.

text_block_list.name: [Demon]
text_block_list.text: Ha! Life has no meaning. You are born, and you disappear. That is all.

text_block_list.name: [Mechanical Doll]
text_block_list.text: But I do not possess life. I am a creation of clear intention.

text_block_list.name: [Mechanical Doll]
text_block_list.text: For 100 years… I have pondered relentlessly. Yet, even with my intellect, pride of my master, the reason eludes me.

text_block_list.name: [Mechanical Doll]
text_block_list.text: Demon, I implore you. Could you grant my wish and reunite me with my creator? I will give you anything you wish.

text_block_list.name: [Demon]
text_block_list.text: No, I refuse. I have no interest in taking anything from you. My desire lies solely with the souls of the living…

text_block_list.name: [Demon]
text_block_list.text: … However, I may consider searching for your so-called creator. But you must bring me… the finest, pure, white soul.

text_block_list.name: [Mechanical Doll]
text_block_list.text: You mean… You want me to take another's life?

text_block_list.name: [Demon]
text_block_list.text: Ha! The lonely monster hesitates? They aren't your "friends" or anything, are they?

text_block_list.name: [Demon]
text_block_list.text: Think about it with your cherished intellect. A hundred years of seeking the reason to your existence, versus the life of someone who doesn't even know it… which is more valuable?

text_block_list.name: [Demon]
text_block_list.text: The deadline is until this ludicrous Hallowe'en concludes. Of course, you won't be able to roam the town any later, will you? I'm looking forward to it… Haha!

text_block_list.name: [Demon]
text_block_list.text: —— For the first time in a century, the monster descended to the village. Among the costumed villagers, its patched appearance didn't stand out. However…

text_block_list.name: [Villager A]
text_block_list.text: Hey look, a new face. Have they always been here? … They seem rather eerie, don't they?

text_block_list.name: [Villager B]
text_block_list.text: Probably a traveller. Our village's festival has quite a reputation. But…… what a strange disguise. Almost as if a monster…

text_block_list.name: [Mechanical Doll]
text_block_list.text: I must bring that demon… a pure white soul ——

text_block_list.name: [Young Girl]
text_block_list.text: —— Oh? Hello there!

text_block_list.name: [Young Girl]
text_block_list.text: What an amazing costume! What's your name?

text_block_list.name: [Young Girl]
text_block_list.text: Don't want to say? That's fine, we'll keep it a secret between us! Even without knowing names, we can still be friends.

text_block_list.name: [Mechanical Doll]
text_block_list.text: Friends…… …… Me, and you?

text_block_list.name: [Young Girl]
text_block_list.text: Yeah, that's right. ―― Nice to meet you, friend!

text_block_list.name: [Mechanical Doll]
text_block_list.text: There is no way to know the color of a soul. But for some reason, I am certain her soul's color is pure and white.

text_block_list.name: [Mechanical Doll]
text_block_list.text: —— Are you searching for clover here? It's futile. Nothing grows in such a barren land.

text_block_list.name: [Young Girl]
text_block_list.text: Hehe, well, let's see about that! Come on, instead of just standing there, lend me a hand!

text_block_list.name: [Young Girl]
text_block_list.text: After we're done, let's enjoy some cake together! I baked a delicious Barmbrack. It'll be your reward if you find one!

text_block_list.name: [Mechanical Doll]
text_block_list.text: —— Friends, until Hallowe'en ends. Until Hallowe'en ends… and after that…

text_block_list.name: [Mechanical Doll]
text_block_list.text: —— This is…

text_block_list.name: [Young Girl]
text_block_list.text: Proof that clovers can grow in this wasteland! I also found some in the past, under a boulder!

text_block_list.name: [Mechanical Doll]
text_block_list.text: … No, it can't be. It is documented that there are no clover in this place.

text_block_list.name: [Young Girl]
text_block_list.text: It's true! I touched them, confirmed their existence, in my eyes, my hands, my heart!

text_block_list.name: [Young Girl]
text_block_list.text: Hey, have you never left this village before? This world is filled with things you can't learn from books!

text_block_list.name: [Young Girl]
text_block_list.text: You see, my dream is to travel the world and see lots of clovers! When that time comes, you should come with me.

text_block_list.name: [Mechanical Doll]
text_block_list.text: …… Why me?

text_block_list.name: [Young Girl]
text_block_list.text: Because it's more fun with friends! ―― Let's promise!
